name: NIXTY
tag_list: education, online-education, lms, cms, learning-management-system, course-management-system, eportfolio, adult-eduation, clep-courses, test-prep, homeschoolers, charter-schools, eduational-technology, edtek, edtech, opencourseware, open-courses
overview:
NIXTY is the Virginia-based startup that is evolving education. The co-founders wanted to create a service with the outrageous goal of empowering education for everyone. They had experience in the eLearning/LMS market, but needed to learn more about open education. They consulted with several thought leaders, professors, and students around what a next generation learning platform might look like. The result is NIXTY!

NIXTY combines powerful technology with open education to meet the audacious goal of empowering education for everyone! NIXTY provides an educational platform that students, educators, and institutions harness to meet their learning goals. Primary products include ePortfolios, courses, and continuing education courses.

NIXTY is currently in beta mode. Sign up at www.nixty.com.
